title: 'Good enough according to price'
body: If you are looking for a pillow at cheap price then you should go for it but it's not good for your neck though. If you are planning to sleep on it for a long time, your neck will eventually start paining after a couple of hours. And if you are buying it just for holding it while you sleep then it's worth the money it's compressible enough to give you the comfort you want. Overall it's a good pillow according to the price.

title: 'The flat
body: and uncomfortable pillow was a huge disappointment and not recommended.''1.0 out of 5 stars'I was excited to try out this pillow, but unfortunately, it turned out to be a huge disappointment. The pillow arrived in a flat, compressed state and did not fluff up as advertised. Even after several nights of use, the pillow remained flat and uncomfortable.  Additionally, the pillow's filling was lumpy and uneven, which made it difficult to find a comfortable sleeping position. It was also too firm for my liking, which left me with a sore neck and shoulders in the morning.  Overall, I would not recommend this pillow to anyone. The poor quality and lack of comfort make it a waste of money. Save yourself the hassle and look for a different pillow that will provide the support and comfort you need for a good night's sleep.
